entity.Name: Soul of Jacob and Esau

spinner.Name: Count
spinner.tooltip: Number of swarm spiders spawned. 1, 3, and 5 are used in the base game.

spinner.Name: Jump Distance
spinner.tooltip: Distance the Fissure will jump based on the center of the Spawner. It will die on the 7th bounce.

spinner.Name: Distance
spinner.tooltip: Distance in grid tiles between the source grid and the Ball and Chain
